bike.description: OCLV Mountain Carbon main frame & stays, Carbon Armor, ABP Convert, Full Floater, E2 tapered head tube, BB95, internal derailleur & dropper post routing, ISCG 05 mount, magnesium EVO link, downtube armor, Mino Link, 140mm travel

components.description: Fox Factory Series 34 Float w/CTD (climb-trail-descend) adjustable FIT damper, rebound, E2 tapered steerer, Kashima coating, 15QR thru axle, 140mm travel
Fox Factory Series Float w/DRCV, CTD (climb-trail-descend) damper, rebound, Kashima coating, tuned by Trek in California, 7.75x2.25"
Bontrager Rhythm Elite Tubeless Ready w/Stacked Lacing, Rapid Drive, 15mm front hub; 142x12 rear hub
Bontrager XR3 Team Issue Tubeless Ready, aramid bead, 27.5x2.35"
Cane Creek IS-3, E2, alloy cartridge
